title: Evelynn Mains Club
body:
Looking for {{champion:28}}  players to join our club. You don't necessarily have to be an Eve one trick or something like that, as long as you enjoy the champion you are more than welcome. We are relatively active with 20+ members ranging from all elos.

The club is called Evelynn Mains OCE and our tag is Ève.

Add my IGN Légs.

{{sticker:katarina-love}}

replies.body:
Hi,
I want to join a club with Eve players. But I can't join a Club in your region right ?
What can I do ?

https://www.reddit.com/r/EvelynnMains/comments/8iuwxd/automated_clubs_megathread/

Here is an automated club mega thread on the Evelynn Mains Reddit, it seems that there are 3 EUW clubs for you!
